title: Conection Problems
body: This is getting annoying the "Connection time out" thing its so annoying it shows up evry 20 secs.My friends have this issue 2 and they cant fix it so guys if you know how to fix this please help me. And i tried the Ip helper thing and it does not work i need help please i tried the troubleshooting issue guide and it does not work please help me !

replies.body:
Since you've already ran through our Connection Guide, I'd like for our tech guys to be able to look into your issue in a ticket. If you could use our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to grab your most recent logs, take those logs and send them to us in a ticket.

Our specialists will be able to provide more context once they can see those logs!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=gWyEUEE0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-18T01:54:51.672+0000)
